strings.evolution:
If you'd just leave me be, when it
comes time to battle I will awaken...
Huh? This type is different, you say?
strings.affinity:
You were always looking out for me,
even though I couldn't remember fighting.
I owe you, too, so much!
strings.description: A berserker who loses her consciousness after going into a battle trance that quickly enhances her physical abilities on the field. Ulrica's genetic abilities cause her to black out directly before and after each battle, jumbling her memory and impairing her logical reasoning. The lack of memories of her own life made her afraid of herself until she received the aid of a certain black mage.
strings.fusion:
So you're doing this because
I'm valuable to you on the battlefield?
I will do my best to keep calm.
strings.summon:
The me who fights.
The normal me.
Which memories are these from...

strings.evolution:
Even the normal me understands.
My fighting form is truly powerful.
strings.affinity:
You were always looking out for me,
even though I couldn't remember fighting.
I owe you, too, so much!
strings.description: A young woman with berserker abilities running through her blood that activate in the presence of mortal danger to awaken her dormant potential. Ulrica was abandoned by her family due to her particular condition, and was forced to wander the land by herself without the slightest memory of her parents. However, one day a black mage who could clarify her predicament appeared. Claiming that her condition stems from an imbalance of magical power, and not spiritual power, he is currently doing everything in his power to help her.
strings.fusion:
Becoming stronger is not scary.
The fighting me will do its best
to protect you all.
strings.summon:
There are two sides to me.
I think the fighting me can
be of use to you.

strings.affinity:
You were always looking out for me,
even though I couldn't remember fighting.
I owe you, too, so much!
strings.description: A young woman with berserker abilities that allow her to unleash her innermost potential through a trance when faced with mortal danger on the battlefield. Although usually quite gentle in nature, Ulrica goes into an involuntary and aggressive frenzy after spotting anyone she considers an enemy. She makes a living by using her skills as a bodyguard for others, but even she fears the state of her own health.
strings.fusion:
Hmph... I am to become stronger?
But it isn't the real me,
so I feel nothing.
strings.summon:
Who are you?
Do you need the power of
my "other me"?
